TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content: Yeah I wanted something related to my soyuz tower but if there is anything more important. ..
Everything is equaly important (except for the modern 39C which is literally a slab on concrete)

New wishlist item:

Better put 100% effort into it. Sounds time consuming and difficult lol.

Job for a newbie to make?

Augustus is not calling the shots, neither is MajorLeague.

Mike if you want to work on something related to your soyuz tower, then go right ahead.

Lets get one thing straight here (I'm talking to the kids), please refrain from giving orders to either Mike-NZ, Kartoffekuchen, Triston or myself. We know what we are doing and we are busy doing it.

If you have any questions regarding what is currently in development, please check out the spread sheet on the first page of the OP. If you have any "wants" or ideas for us, please first check the spread sheet and see if it is either listed in the to-do-list or already under development.

Augustus is not calling the shots, neither is MajorLeague.

Don't call us kids, and I'm not giving orders.

Let's try to limit the pictures to either complete meshes or actual complete and textured models. We don't need to see a flat plane or 3 cubes stacked on top of each other. If anything, add all images to a single imgur album and post it here once it has a couple of images worth showing.

Something I've been thinking about:

What if we used KSCSwitcher to get rid of the stock KSC and put a clone KSC at, for example, Vandenburg?

UPDATE:

Well it seems as if doing that gets rid of the land around where the stock KSC was, and I can't remove the building without removing the land.

Even re-locating the building to the ocean and keeping the PQS land mass where it is doesn't fix it.
